Class Student

java.lang.Object
Student
public class Student
extends java.lang.Object
Represents a single Student and their GMU information.
Since:
1.0

  • Constructor Details

    • Student

      public Student​(java.lang.String name)
      One argument constructor that creates a new Student.
      Parameters:
      name - Represents the Student's name, which must be non null/numeric/empty.

    • Student

      public Student​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String year)
      Two argument constructor that creates a new Student.
      Parameters:
      name - Represents the Student's name, which must be non numeric/empty.
      year - Represents the Student's year at GMU (freshman, sophomore, junior, senior)

  • Method Details

    • validateYear

      private boolean validateYear​(java.lang.String year)

    • validateName

      private boolean validateName​(java.lang.String name)

    • getName

      public java.lang.String getName()
      Gets the name representation of the Student.
      Returns:
      Returns the name of the Student.

    • getYear

      public java.lang.String getYear()
      Gets the year standing of a Student.
      Returns:
      Returns the year of a Student at GMU.

    • getAllCourses

      public static java.util.ArrayList<Course> getAllCourses()
      Gets the all courses added at GMU.
      Returns:
      Returns a list of the courses at GMU that have been not been added already.

    • addCourse

      public boolean addCourse​(Course c, float grade) throws UniversityException, java.lang.Exception
      Adds a course to a student's gradebook if all conditions/criterion are met.
      Parameters:
      c - The course to be added to a student's gradebook
      grade - The grade of that particular course to be attempted to add to the gradebook.
      Returns:
      Returns true if the course was added successfully, false if not.
      Throws:
      UniversityException - Thrown if the student does not meet the minimum grade for the course.
      java.lang.Exception - Thrown if the course was not found in the registry.

    • graduation

      public float graduation() throws UniversityException
      Performs graduation of a given student and determines if they are eligible based on a protocol. The student must have taken courses first off.
      Returns:
      Returns the final GPA of a student (assuming they are eligible for graduation).
      Throws:
      UniversityException - Thrown if the Student's GPA is lower than the minimum to graduate and/or the Student does not have enough credits.
